title: Attorney General Loretta E. Lynch Delivers Remarks at Press Conference Announcing Settlement with BP to ...
text: ( Source : Office of the Attorney General ) Remarks as prepared for delivery Good morning and thank you all for being here. I am joined by Secretary [ Penny] Pritzker from the Department of Commerce ; Secretary [ Tom] Vilsack from the Department
